verbs.description: [ARG0: supreme court justices] [V: condemn] [ARG1: partisan treatment of nominee brett kavanaugh by senators] three supreme court justices have decried the senate highly partisan confirmation process for nominee brett kavanaugh clarence thomas ruth bader ginsburg brett kavanaugh sen cory booker bill clinton cory booker washington supreme court senate judiciary committee senate supreme court of canada democrats justice ruth bader ginsburg three supreme court elena kagan
